title: Make the web app installable as an Android-friendly PWA

requirements.text: Add Progressive Web App (PWA) support so the existing AASRA cab web app can be installed and used like an Android app (Add to Home Screen), including a web app manifest, required Android icon sizes, and appropriate HTML meta tags.
acceptanceCriteria: A valid web app manifest is present and linked from the app HTML.
The manifest includes at least name, short_name, start_url, display (standalone), theme_color, background_color, and icons.
At least one 192x192 and one 512x512 app icon are available and referenced by the manifest.
The app shows as installable in a modern Android browser (e.g., Chrome) and launches in standalone mode when installed.

requirements.text: Ensure the installed PWA experience works well on Android by verifying key screens are responsive and touch-friendly (header navigation, booking flow, contact options, and tracking screens) and that content is not clipped on small viewports.
acceptanceCriteria: Core pages (Home, Book a Cab, Contact, Tracking, Profile) are usable on common Android viewport widths without horizontal scrolling.
Tap targets in the header/mobile menu and primary CTAs are comfortably clickable on touch devices.
No critical UI elements are obscured by fixed/sticky UI on small screens.

requirements.text: Add the generated PWA icon assets into the project as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them from the PWA manifest.
acceptanceCriteria: New icon files exist under frontend/public/assets/generated.
The manifest references the icons using correct paths and sizes.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI sources must be composed, not modified).
Do not edit frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
Backend remains a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; no additional backend services.
nonGoals: Building or publishing a native Android APK/AAB to the Google Play Store.
Adding push notifications or real-time WebSocket features as part of the Android effort.

required: Square app icon with a clean, modern cab/travel mark and warm earthy palette (pwa-icon-192.dim_192x192.png)
Square app icon with a clean, modern cab/travel mark and warm earthy palette (pwa-icon-512.dim_512x512.png)
Maskable square app icon variant with generous safe area and warm earthy palette (pwa-maskable-512.dim_512x512.png)
